page.title: 04GOVERNMENT & CIVIL DEFENCE
page.content: National government represented in Broadmayne & Warmwell area:Mr.J.Spicer Poxwell:Lord Cranborne who are Conservative M.P.s.Local Gov.:County Council:Lt.Col.P.Woodward.District Council:Mrs J.Gregory & Mr.R.Symes. Poxwell Parish Meeting-Chairman: Mr.J.Lane & Warmwell:Chairman:Mr.H. Ross-Skinner.Broadmayne Parish Council -7councillors,Chairman:Mrs.J.Salt. Precept 1985,Â£3,100.Owns the surgery & allotments which were gifts of Misses Cross,late of the village.Teams of local people for contigency plans for emergencies,including nuclear attack.List of people distributed for local emergencies e.g. snow.The County Council & District responsible for most services.Wessex Water Authority for water supply & source in nearby underground unlikely ever to run dry. Warmwell has no mains drainage.
